CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Diagnosis Confirmed stage positioned above or below the Treatment Completed stage?
SRP.A: The Diagnosis Confirmed stage is positioned {above} the Treatment Completed stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Treatment Recommended?
VE.A: The value of stage Treatment Recommended is {2256}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Treatment Initiated?
VE.A: The value of stage Treatment Initiated is {1506}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Treatment Completed?
VE.A: The value of stage Treatment Completed is {838}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Diagnostic Testing, with a value of {3803}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Treatment Completed, with a value of {838}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Treatment Initiated to stage Treatment Completed?
SC.A: Decreased by {668} Patients from stage Treatment Initiated to stage Treatment Completed.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 2660? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Diagnostic Testing} stage has {3803}, the {Diagnosis Confirmed} stage has {3064}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 2660? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Treatment Recommended} stage has {2256}, the {Treatment Initiated} stage has {1506}, the {Treatment Completed} stage has {838}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 1172 and 3433? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Diagnosis Confirmed} stage has {3064}, the {Treatment Recommended} stage has {2256}, the {Treatment Initiated} stage has {1506}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Diagnostic Testing to Diagnosis Confirmed, or from stage Treatment Initiated to Treatment Completed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Diagnostic Testing} to {Diagnosis Confirmed} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Treatment Initiated to Treatment Completed, or from stage Treatment Recommended to Treatment Initiated?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Treatment Recommended} to {Treatment Initiated} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Diagnostic Testing to Diagnosis Confirmed, from stage Treatment Initiated to Treatment Completed, or from stage Treatment Recommended to Treatment Initiated?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Treatment Recommended} to stage {Treatment Initiated} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Diagnosis Confirmed} and {Treatment Recommended} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Treatment Initiated} and {Treatment Completed} stages.
